resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in to the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
System remembers this account. Tap to login.
Change password, bind phone, and etc.
Account has been registered but not activated
If you have already activated a TV account, please use that account to log in. This account can be used for Le Video membership services and viewing content on both your TV and phone.

For the security of your personal information and legitimate rights, please bind with your mobile number immediately. An E-mail has been sent to %s. Please log in to your E-mail account and complete the binding.
Use phone number to log in after registration

Please enter the old password before changing

Cloud services: sync photos and other data to your devices

To ensure the security of your account, please set a password for it. You will be prompted for the password when changing the password and exiting LeCloud.
Email address bound with the Le account:

Activation code verification error. Please request a new code and try again.

Please enter your phone number as the username of your LeEco account

You have already registered for Le.com. Please enter your log in password to activate Le Video membership service.

"To best protect your account, security and privacy, we recommend using your mobile phone number to complete registration. Secure passwords should be 6-16 characters with letters, numbers and symbols. (special characters and spaces not supported) Please use your phone to register. If you would rather use your email, please visit the Letv website. If you wish to use a partner account, please scan the login QR code."
"Activation code has been sent via SMS to your phone. Please enter the code to activate your Letv account. If you haven't received the code within 30 seconds, please request a new one."
"Your account %s is now registered! Log in to watch Letv's videos."
"If you do not receive the code, please click 'Get a new activation code'"
If you forget your password, send a new password of 6-16 character to %s to change your password

"\u0009\u0009\u0009With a Letv video membership, user can get access to the largest video library in China, 1080P super HD quality, perfect Dolby sound effect and viewing privileges for stunning 3D films, various apps in Letv app store, Letv cloud services for the entire family, device storage backup, multi-screen support and 1080P express service."

"Please use your Letv account to log in. If you registered via a partner account, please scan the QR code to log in. Notice: Tap [?123] -> [ALT] on your keyboard if you need special characters such as _."

Registration failed. Please confirm the activation code and your password before registering again.

"A good password should be 6-16 characters long with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols. (Chinese characters and spaces not supported) Notice: 1. Passwords for partner accounts cannot be changed unless a phone number or E-mail address is bound with the account. 2. Phone users may send an SMS with a new 6-16 character password to %s to change password."
New password does not meet the minimum safety requirements. Please read requirements and try again.
Current password is incorrect. Please try again.
New password must be a combination of 6 to 16 letters/numbers/symbols, and cannot contain double-digit characters and spaces.
The two passwords do not match, please try again
Please enter 4 to 32 characters. Numbers only and special characters are not allowed.
Please log in to your email address and activate the account now

A valid password should be 6-16 characters long with letters/numbers/symbols. (Double-byte character and space are not supported)

Please visit Le Store to download and install the latest release of Le Sports app to proceed
Skip logging in to LeEco account?
We suggest you log in to your LeEco account
One account to unlock all LeEco services
You can buy and then enjoy paid content as a Le Video member, such as live streaming for games and concerts.
With a LeEco account you can use the Super Live service, and sync your Favourites and history to different devices through LeCloud Video.
Integrated super desktop apps for content searching, combination, recommendations, Le Channels and sharing.
Access your photos, contacts and calendar on your devices.
Log in an account to enjoy popular apps, games and more services.
You can buy various products in LeMall: TV, phone, film tickets, Le Video membership, and concert tickets.
An official, interactive platform for all users of Le Ecosystem, with abundant online and offline activities.
Your LeEco account will be bound with this device. Some functions, apps and services are only available in select areas.
Unable to sync, please try syncing again

LeCloud sync supports the data sync of Contacts, Gallery and other apps like Notes, Calendar and Browser. You can enable LeCloud sync services to back up your data. During data sync, the phone may use cellular network data or connect to a Wi-Fi network.

LeCloud sync includes the data sync of various apps such as Notes, Calendar and Browser. You can enable LeCloud sync services to back up your data. During data sync, the phone may use cellular network data or connect to a Wi-Fi network.
One-key sync and log out of your account
